newsitem.title: USA: Northwest Airlines to cut some fares.
newsitem.headline: Northwest Airlines to cut some fares.

text.p: Northwest Airlines Corp said Monday it was offering fare cuts of up to 55 percent on select days to most destinations.
The fare sale is for travel between August 25 and December 16, the airline said.
Fares from the United States to London have been cut as much as 35 percent, Northwest said.
Domestic fares must be purchased by August 21. Passengers can save most traveling Tuesday, Wednesday or Saturday, Northwest said.
All fares are non-refundable and must be purchased at least 14 days before departure, the company said.
Northwest shares were down 1/16 at 40 Monday.
